text:
Hi everyone,
 I want to transfer ownership of these two packages to JuliaIO.
 <https://github.com/Agent-Hellboy/ImgHdr.jl|https://github.com/Agent-Hellboy/ImgHdr.jl>

<https://github.com/Agent-Hellboy/FileType.jl|https://github.com/Agent-Hellboy/FileType.jl>

If you all think that this could be helpful to the community then please take the ownership.

elements.text:
Hi everyone,
 I want to transfer ownership of these two packages to JuliaIO.
If you all think that this could be helpful to the community then please take the ownership.

text: <@U680THK2S>, would you be willing to help with the transfer?

elements.text: , would you be willing to help with the transfer?

text: I've added you as a member of the organization. You can transfer to JuliaIO via the repository settings. Let me know when that's all squared away and whether you have any questions.

elements.text: I've added you as a member of the organization. You can transfer to JuliaIO via the repository settings. Let me know when that's all squared away and whether you have any questions.

text: Thank you, I have transferred it. Please update the CI pipeline.

elements.text: Thank you, I have transferred it. Please update the CI pipeline.

text: For the CI pipeline, you'll want to switch it from Travis to GitHub Actions. That's something that any user can do. See <https://github.com/JuliaLang/Example.jl> for an example of how it's set up.
